Detailed Description

A simple implementation of a statistics gatherer Keeps a running tab on the total sum of results and the sum of results^2 The results: 1D vector - the mean, the standard deviation

std::vector< std::vector< double > > StatGathering::StatisticsMean::GetResultsSoFar (  )  const [virtual]

Get the results so far 2D vector of results: in this case, dimensions (1,2) The two elements are: mean, standard deviation

Returns:
Return by value, a 2D vector of dimension (1,2) giving mean, standard deviation
